Content:
I did everything right. I kept the battery charged up, put in fuel conditioner before I put it away and ran it several miles to make sure it was mixed well and the conditioned gas was in the float bowls. I went to start it this spring, made sure it was in neutral, put the choke on and nothing. Finally the battery died so I charged the battery and the same thing happened. I thought the carbs must have got gummed up. Today, I was thinking what could be wrong.

I left the kickstand down.

Title: My Goldwing Won't Start
Author: Steadfastly
